thread.title_full: San Diego Hotels Like Declan Suites Welcome Visitors To The Top San Diego Events In August

title: San Diego Hotels Like Declan Suites Welcome Visitors To The Top San Diego Events In August
text: San Diego Hotels Like Declan Suites Welcome Visitors To The Top San Diego Events In August By PR Newswire | 07/31/15 - 06:19 PM EDT Reprint SAN DIEGO , Jul 31, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- San Diego Hotels like Declan Suites San Diego welcome the many visitors who come to attend popular August events like the World Bodysurfing Championships or the San Diego Summer Choral Festival. Declan Suites has impressive special offers to welcome those who come for these or other popular San Diego Events. View offer details . Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20150731/252576 World Bodysurfing Championships August 22 through August 23, 2015 Oceanside Pier | 300 The Strand North, Oceanside, CA 92054 The top athletes in the sport will come to the City for this San Diego event. 2015 marks the 39th year for this competition and more than 350 surfers will come to take part in the various events. Spectators will be on hand to cheer on their favorites athletes and to watch as these men and women take to the water and catch some waves. Taylor Swift Concert August 29, 2015 PETCO Park | 100 Park Boulevard San Diego, CA 92101Tel: 619.795.5000 Taylor Swift is popular with fans of all ages, and many of those fans will come from out of town to attend this San Diego Event. Swift will sing her biggest hits like You Belong With Me, I Knew You Were Trouble, and We Are Never Ever Getting Back Together. This Grammy-award winner will be at PETCO Park for 1 night only, so tickets should be reserved well in advance. San Diego Summer Choral Festival August 6 through August 9, 2015 St. Andrew by the Sea, Pacific Beach | 1050 Thomas Avenue San Diego, CA 92109 This San Diego event is much more than a chance to see some of the country's best choirs. It is also a chance for vocalists and musicians to attend workshops designed to help them improve their technique. Tickets may sell out for this popular event, so those wishing to attend should reserve their spot as soon as possible. San Diego Spirits Festival August 22 through August 23, 2015 Port Pavilion Broadway Pier This is a fun San Diego event that offers lots of great cocktails, food, and music. Some of the best bartenders and the top chefs will be on hand to make sure that every attendee has the opportunity to try some of the best food and drinks that the City has to offer. Those planning to these or other San Diego Events can consider the ideal location of Declan Suites San Diego. Check Rates, Make Reservations or call 855.968.3429. About Declan Suites - A San Diego Hotel: Both business and leisure travelers find the Accommodations at Declan Suites to be a perfect choice. This San Diego Hotel is an all-suite property, and the 2-room guest suites are some of the largest in the city. This is the only all-suite Hotel in Downtown San Diego . Declan Suites - A San Diego Hotel is conveniently located adjacent to Symphony Hall. The luxurious Hotel is also within walking distance of some of the most popular San Diego Attractions including the San Diego Zoo and some of the city's top Museums. 1 of 2
